text: The 1968 Ballon d'Or was the 13th Ballon d'Or awarded. It was won by Manchester United winger George Best. ==Rankings== Rank Name Club(s) Nationality Points 1 George Best Manchester United 61 2 Bobby Charlton Manchester United 53 3 Dragan Džajić Red Star Belgrade 46 4 Franz Beckenbauer Bayern Munich 36 5 Giacinto Facchetti Internazionale 30 6 Luigi Riva Cagliari 22 7 Amancio Amaro Real Madrid 21 8 Eusébio Benfica 15 9 Gianni Rivera Milan 13 10 Jimmy Greaves Tottenham Hotspur 8 Pirri Real Madrid 8 12 Antal Dunai Újpest 7 Willi Schulz Hamburger SV 7 14 Georgi Asparuhov Levski Sofia 6 Albert Shesternyov CSKA Moscow 6 16 Ove Kindvall Feyenoord 5 17 Flórián Albert Ferencváros 4 Sandro Mazzola Internazionale 4 Lajos Szűcs Ferencváros 4 20 Johan Cruyff Ajax 3 Gerd Müller Bayern Munich 3 22 Jack Charlton Leeds United 2 Bobby Moore West Ham United 2 24 Alan Ball Everton 1 Ferenc Bene Újpest 1 Angelo Domenghini Internazionale 1 Mirsad Fazlagić Sarajevo 1 Tommy Gemmell Celtic 1 Jimmy Johnstone Celtic 1 Murtaz Khurtsilava Dinamo Tbilisi 1 Ivica Osim Željezničar 1 Louis Pilot Standard Liège 1 ==References== ==Other websites== * France Football Official Ballon d'Or page Category:1968 in association football Category:1968 in European football Category:Ballon d'Or
title: 1968 Ballon d'Or
